data.title: Simon Cahn
data.meta_description: Simon Cahn is a French writer/director. He began directing at 19 years old. After a few years living in New York, he returned to Paris to direct commercials for international brands such as Nike, Dior, Diesel, Google, Asos, Louis Vuitton and Supreme. He co-directed and co-wrote âMourir AuprÃ¨s de Toi.â a short film with Spike Jonze. The film was selected at the Cannes Festival in the Criticsâ Week section, the Locarno Film Festival, Londonâs BFI Film Festival and the Dallas Film Festival. Parallel to his commercial work, Simon has directed an abundance of music videos for artists such as Danny Brown, Breakbot, Hanni El Khatib, We Are Shining, Fono and Denai Moore. Simon is currently developing his first feature film debut âOSCARâ.
data.text: Simon Cahn is a French writer/director. He began directing at 19 years old. After a few years living in New York, he returned to Paris to direct commercials for international brands such as Nike, Dior, Diesel, Google, Asos, Louis Vuitton and Supreme. He co-directed and co-wrote âMourir AuprÃ¨s de Toi.â a short film with Spike Jonze. The film was selected at the Cannes Festival in the Criticsâ Week section, the Locarno Film Festival, Londonâs BFI Film Festival and the Dallas Film Festival. Parallel to his commercial work, Simon has directed an abundance of music videos for artists such as Danny Brown, Breakbot, Hanni El Khatib, We Are Shining, Fono and Denai Moore. Simon is currently developing his first feature film debut âOSCARâ.
